item.title: My Journey into Data Science and IT During the COVID-19 Pandemic
item.description: My Journey into Data Science and IT During the COVID-19 Pandemic Introduction: An Unexpected Turn In the wake of my unexpected layoff in February 2020, just days after my birthday and as the world teetered on the brink of lockdown, I embarked on an unforeseen and transformative journey through the realms of Information Technology (IT) and Data Science. The Shift to Technology My academic foundation in Cognitive Sciences and experience in brain imaging research and MatLab programming had initially pointed me towards a scientific career.
